title: Problem with clubs
body:
Hello,
I'm currently the leader of a club with the, 
Name= Yummmy
Tag= Tumii

I am able to see the club tag and club name but I'm still unable to see the chat room. 
I also can't add or delete people off the club.
Everyone in my club can see the chat room except me, is there anyone who can help me fix this problem? 

Thank you in advance!

replies.body:
We've resolved most of the Clubs issues, so I'm sorry to hear we missed you! If you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll work with you to resolve this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
